Hero.description: Coco AI is a fully open-source, cross-platform intelligent search and assistant system designed for modern enterprises. It provides a unified search entry point to connect heterogeneous internal and external data sources, integrates large language model capabilities, and empowers teams to access knowledge efficiently, make smarter decisions, and collaborate intelligently.

Efficiency.title: Get It Done, Fast
Efficiency.description: Efficiency is Coco's core, from search to action, it's addictively fast.

Server.title: Your AI Brain, Powered by Coco Server
Server.description: As the core backend of Coco AI, Coco Server supports data source integration, AI assistant & model management, knowledge base construction, as well as MCP services and embedding capabilities, helping enterprises and developers deploy flexibly, manage centrally, and build customized intelligent work platforms.

Tools.title: Extend Your Stack
Tools.description: Plugins are capabilities, every extension makes you more powerful.

Deploy.title: Deploy Anywhere, Secure Everywhere
Deploy.description: Flexible deployment options, your data always in control, compliance has never been simpler.

Work.title: Work Transformed
Work.description: See what your workflow could become
Work.title2: Insert the Straw and Get Started

Community.title: Join Our Community
Community.description: Get the latest updates and discuss with other users

Download.title: Get Coco. Get Productive
Download.envText: * For other installation environments, please select
Download.window: Support for Windows 10 and above versions
Download.unbuntu: Supports Ubuntu 22.04 and later versions (X11 only)

FAQ.title: FAQ
FAQ.description: Quick answers to common Coco use cases and features
